short_summary: Purchase of valves and related components
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
Valve, Parts Kit
================

### Title
Valve, Parts Kit
### Reference Number
PW-23-01024935
### Solicitation Number
W8482-230831/A
### Amendment Number
1
### Publication Date
2023-02-08
### Tender Closing Date
2023-03-10T14:00:00
### Amendment Date
2023-02-10

### Contract Details
The Department of National Defence invites suppliers to submit bids for the supply of valves and parts kits.
* GSIN: 4820, VALVES, NONPOWERED
* Items to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Tender Description
The tender requires the delivery of 4 items as follows:

* Item 1: 12 Regulating Valves, EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: 8 Regulating Valves, EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 3: 15 Parts Kits, EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 4: 12 Parts Kits, EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Bidder Requirements
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAG.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

### Notice Details
The notice type is a Request for Proposal (RFP), which includes two attachments:

* Amendment 001
* RFP in English
* RFP in French

### Contact Information
* Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca, 555-555-5555
* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

Note: 
The only thing left out is the mention of the procurement method, ToIO and solicitation packaging  given there is no importance as the answer clearly states the bid is already expired. 

**Note to the Contractor:** Please adjust your english literacy to make these technical-writings more accessible and professional to your colleagues. 
Example of good writing revision:
 1. **non rambling statement**
 -> **concise explanation**
2. spelling, grammar, capitalization, punctuation, usage
3. Context – wording that is understandable across Canada and or
